description: Array of application modes the settings tab is shown for.  E.g. `['edit', 'clean']`.  If omitted the settings tab will be available for all application modes.
File URL of the HTML template to display for the settings tab.  URL must be relative to [appPath](docs://Development/APIs/File Helpers) or absolute.
Name of the controller to apply to the settings tab **OR** a controller function with dependencies injected through its arguments.
Default setting values.  Default values are applied when settings are loaded.
Default global setting values.  Default values are applied when global settings are loaded.
